div.p: Please contact Mandy Stevenson, Director of Special Programs, at mstevenson@kountzeisd.org or 246-3474, if you are interested in requesting a special education evaluation. Mandy will help you navigate that process and assist you with your concerns.

Our Monthly School Board Meeting is the Second Monday of the month and is held in the Kountze Intermediate School Library. It is also listed in the District Calendar on the District Webpage. If the time, date or location ever changes or a special meeting is called we will post the change(s) on our webpage, our Facebook pages and this page (https://v3.boardbook.org/Public/PublicHome.aspx?ak=1001975). This link will also give you the ability to view the agenda of each meeting (which will be posted at least 72 hours in advance) and the minutes after they are approved.

center.h4: Notice Requirement for the Families First Coronavirus Response Act

div.p: Due to COVID-19 concerns the district is in the process of discussing the date and safest method for holding cheerleading tryouts for the 2020-2021 school year. Please fill out the following google . . .

div.h4: KISD Covid-19 Grading Policy Posted Date: 04/20/2020
div.p: Click here to access the KISD Covid-19 Grading Policy. This is the policy we will use for grading during the time we have been out of school from . . .

div.h4: Tips for Managing Behaviors for at Home Learning Posted Date: 04/20/2020

div.p: Dear KISD Families:In accordance with the Governor’s Executive Order dated 4/17/2020, Kountze ISD will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. The Texas Education A[...] . . .

div.h4: At Home Learning Resources for Students with Disabilities Posted Date: 04/09/2020

div.p:
Dear KISD Families:
Out of an abundance of caution classes at Kountze ISD are cancelled beginning Tuesday, March 17 through Friday, March 20. On March 23, we will begin our flexible education . . .

div.h4: Here is some information released by the CDC about the Coronavirus Posted Date: 02/06/2020
Gifted and Talented Selection Process Posted Date: 01/30/2020
div.p: If you are interested in the possibility of having your child enrolled in S.I.T.E., our district Gifted & Talented program, we will be having an informational meeting Thursday January 23rd from . . .

div.h4: KISD will offer FREE Hotspots for school work Posted Date: 10/29/2019
div.p: Beginning Monday, November 4th, we will have FREE hotspots available for checkout at each campus library. The hotspot is from T-Mobile and will have 2 GB of data per month. These will be for your . . .
